actions.name: create_custom_property
actions.description: Create a custom property for a site

actions.name: create_goal
actions.description: Find or create a goal for a site

actions.name: create_shared_link
actions.description: Find or create a shared link for a site

actions.name: create_site
actions.description: Create a new site in your Plausible account

actions.name: delete_custom_property
actions.description: Delete a custom property from a site

actions.name: delete_goal
actions.description: Delete a goal from a site

actions.name: delete_site
actions.description: Delete a site and all its data from your Plausible account. This action is permanent and may take up to 48 hours to complete.

actions.name: get_site
actions.description: Get details of a site including tracker script configuration

actions.name: invite_guest
actions.description: Invite a guest to access a site or find an existing invitation

actions.name: list_custom_properties
actions.description: Get a list of custom properties for a site

actions.name: list_goals
actions.description: Get a list of goals for a site

actions.name: list_guests
actions.description: Get a list of guests for a site

actions.name: list_sites
actions.description: Get a list of sites your Plausible account can access

actions.name: list_teams
actions.description: Get a list of teams your Plausible account can access

actions.name: remove_guest
actions.description: Remove a guest or invitation from a site

actions.name: update_site
actions.description: Update an existing site in your Plausible account
